text: @USDA @usdafsa @FarmersGov @SecretarySonny I pray this helps rural cattle ranchers like ours. In addition to COVID19, S. Arkansas was hit by a tornado on Easter which destroyed lots of big timber, demolished fencing, & created much destruction. We need help to repair fencing and cleanup.  @POTUS @JohnTrumpFanKJV
